title: P2P Payment Fraud via UPI
description: Scammers exploit peer-to-peer (P2P) payment platforms like UPI to deceive users into transferring money or revealing personal details.

title: Fake Electricity Bill Scams in Hyderabad
description: Fraudulent messages threaten Hyderabad residents with power disconnection unless immediate payment is made, leading to financial losses.

title: AI-Generated Deepfake Scams
description: The misuse of deepfake technology has led to scams involving AI-generated audio and video, raising concerns over election manipulation and the need for stricter enforcement.

title: WhatsApp Account Bans to Combat Fraud
description: WhatsApp banned approximately 9.9 million Indian accounts in January 2025 to combat fraudulent activities and scams on the platform.
